caption:
Published http://akepalos.github.io a day ago. Just for fun! ✍

Damned tarot consultation. Gave me 'The Death' card right away after the very first test. Lol.
Whoa! Got my quadrail pickup today. 🤘🔥
Night view from my new home! 😁

Made my own manually coded short visual novel game! Can't wait to announce the release date. Tho, I'm still having problems with looking up for usable free-to-use background musics. Can't record a high quality sound with my own equipments.

P.S.: Illustrations are made by sutemo and Potat0Master.
Got my very first guitar effect pedals today! 🥳 Rowin's Holy War pedal sounds hellish asf. 🎸🔥
Nougat programming language's now out! After almost four months of development full of discontinuities. Check it out here at https://nougat.neocities.org.
Finally got the time to practice. 🤘 Tuning pegs and strings are kinda rusty. 😔
La Pregunta's now available! Check my project pages. 🤘🎮
